rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, put an encroachment counter on Approach of Old Lovi, then it deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of encroachment counters on Approach of Old Lovi.
flavor_text: [i]In some places, reality rearranged itself gently, like wind carrying leaves. In others, the old world devoured and transformed the new one like a fire.[/i]
